scripts.zip: bestzip build/linux-arm64.zip build/Overwigger-linux-arm64/ && bestzip build/linux-armv7l.zip build/Overwigger-linux-armv7l/ && bestzip build/linux-ia32.zip build/Overwigger-linux-ia32/ && bestzip build/linux-x64.zip build/Overwigger-linux-x64/ && bestzip build/win-ia32.zip build/Overwigger-win32-ia32/ && bestzip build/win-x64.zip build/Overwigger-win32-x64/
scripts.package: npm run build && electron-packager . --overwrite --asar --out=build --all --prune --icon=icon.ico && npm run zip
